greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1 - x^2) * (1 - x^4) * (1 - x^5) / ((1 - x) * (1 - x^10)) in powers of x.
formula: a(-n) = a(n). a(n + 5) = -a(n) unless n=0 or n=-5.
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 - x^4) / (1 - x + x^2 - x^3 + x^4), {x, 0, 50}], x] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 12 2017 *)
xref: A164116(n) = (-1)^n * a(n). Convolution inverse of A164117.
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Aug 10 2009
